hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Adiyy bin Hatim said:"Two men recited a Tashahhud before the Prophet and one of them said: 'Whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger has been guided aright and whoever disobeys them has gone astray.' The Messenger of Allah said: 'What a bad speaker you are

chapter.eng-name: What Is Disliked In The Khutbah
